title: unreasonable ban
body: my friend told me to type some words in chat while in a 5 man party with them, this was all a joke between a 5 man party in the team chat which the enemies could not see, i was banned for this small string of words in a single game said as a joke between a premade group, i do not understand why, please give me information or repeal my ban

First let's preface this by, these are all words on a screen, and if they are really doing gaming for those reasons, they should pick a different game, and get some professional help.

But this is also OCE, and generally speaking, i would say a higher portion of the population have a higher tolerance level for shit like this.

Sure i get it, some people would actually kill themselves, but that isn't on the person that tells them to do that, because in reality, they are just putting words into their computer, the person killing themselves should have gone and got professional help, and the people in their life should have also noticed that they needed said help.

Is kys a bad thing to say? yes

But if your at the point of reading what some dumbass on the internet says and taking it as something you should do... seriously, go get some professional help.
